name: logmagnifier
description: A powerful log analysis tool for Visual Studio Code, featuring advanced log filtering and diverse highlighting options.
author: webispy@gmail.com

logmagnifier.tempFilePrefix.description: Prefix for the filtered temp files.

logmagnifier.statusBarTimeout.description: Duration for status bar messages in milliseconds.

logmagnifier.jsonPreview.enabled.description: Enable automatic JSON preview update when active line changes.

logmagnifier.jsonPreview.maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines to process for JSON preview. Selections exceeding this limit will be truncated.

logmagnifier.regex.enableHighlight.description: Enable highlighting for Regex filters in the editor.

logmagnifier.regex.highlightColor.description: Background color for Regex highlight. Can be a color string, a preset name (e.g. 'Red'), or an object with light/dark values.

logmagnifier.bookmark.maxMatches.description: Maximum number of matches to add to bookmarks at once.

logmagnifier.removeMatches.maxLines.description: Threshold for confirming removal of lines matching selection.

logmagnifier.adbLogcatDefaultOptions.description: Default options for adb logcat command.

commands.title: Add Word Filter Group
commands.description: Create a new group to organize word filters

view/item/context.when: viewItem =~ /filterGroup.*/ && (view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && viewItem == filterGroupDisabled
viewItem =~ /filterGroup.*/ && (view == logmagnifier-filters || view == logmagnifier-regex-filters) && viewItem == filterGroupEnabled

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
